abstract: Discovery is retooling its nine-year-old Discovery HD Theater as Velocity, an “upscale men’s lifestyle network” about fast cars, fancy auctions and famous races.
snippet: Discovery is retooling its nine-year-old Discovery HD Theater as Velocity, an “upscale men’s lifestyle network” about fast cars, fancy auctions and famous races.
lead_paragraph: Discovery Communication’s latest cable channel has a very specific — and well-heeled — viewer in mind: men making $150,000 or more a year.

headline.main: New Discovery Channel Targets Wealthy Men
